content: I know that the questions in this stream haven't been universally entry level, but is #learning: basic questions really the place to be asking this, @Nathaniel Virgo ?
I was really unsure where to put it. Maybe it's better in general? I'll delete it and move it somewhere else.

(Sorry, I was going back and forth trying to work out where to put it. Topos theory might be appropriate but I know so little about that field that I'm not sure. It's not exactly 'category theory' or 'applied category theory', so maybe 'general'? But that's the stream everyone is subscribed to, so I didn't want to impose myself. 'Philosophy', maybe?)
#general is supposed to be for topics relevant to everyone
maybe we need new streams for logic or probability though?
Ah, I posted in #general already. Should I delete there too?
I've made a new stream #theory: logic: let's post it there
Ok, I deleted from general and posted it there.
How do I delete this topic @James Wood?
I am not sure you can, but empty topics are basically hidden so it's not a big deal.
Another thing you can do is renaming this topic to another topic.
Maybe if we all delete our messages, then it's possible.
I don't see why you want to be deleting stuff. It's all potentially useful information.
